channel.title: CVE Feed for Citrix -- Citrix Workspace App for Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Citrix -- Citrix Workspace App for Windows

item.title: CVE-2023-24485|2024-08-02T10:56:04.241Z -- citrix -- citrix%20workspace%20app%20for%20windows
item.description: Vulnerabilities have been identified that, collectively, allow a standard Windows user to perform operations as SYSTEM on the computer running Citrix Workspace app.

item.title: CVE-2023-24484|2024-08-02T10:56:04.298Z -- citrix -- citrix%20workspace%20app%20for%20windows
item.description: A malicious user can cause log files to be written to a directory that they do not have permission to write to.

item.title: CVE-2024-6286|2024-08-01T21:33:05.352Z -- citrix -- citrix%20workspace%20app%20for%20windows
item.description: Local Privilege escalation allows a low-privileged user to gain SYSTEM privileges in Citrix Workspace app for Windows

item.title: CVE-2024-6286|2024-07-11T03:55:34.800Z -- citrix -- citrix%20workspace%20app%20for%20windows
item.description: Local Privilege escalation allows a low-privileged user to gain SYSTEM privileges in Citrix Workspace app for Windows

item.title: CVE-2024-6286|2024-07-10T20:25:21.414Z -- citrix -- citrix%20workspace%20app%20for%20windows
item.description: Local Privilege escalation allows a low-privileged user to gain SYSTEM privileges in Citrix Workspace app for Windows

item.description: Local Privilege escalation allows a low-privileged user to gain SYSTEM privileges in Citrix Workspace app for Windows
